resource_description: The Portal provides a variety of resources to help meat producers, processors, and local retail outlets grow their businesses, and also provides a listing of regional meat sources to enable consumers to find local and regenerative meat products in Northern California.

The mission of KnowFood.Live is to deliver interactive content that is intellectually seductive, engaging, memorable, interactive, and fun for executives, professionals, educators, and policy-makers actively engaged in, or considering entering, Local-to-Global Ag/Food/Health Systems and/or in Information Technology related to these systems.
